item.description: This class meets once per month and is designed for the spiritual seeker that is looking to deepen their experience of peace and joy and expand their understanding of the spiritual truths taught by all of the religions. Each class will have two components. The first half of the class will focus on the art of meditation. It will include a guided meditation followed by a practical discussion of how one can learn to deepen their meditative practice. The second half of the class will include a reading from the sacred text of one particular religion and a discussion of the truths put forth there and their practical modern-day application.
